body:
Comment 11 by **galargotv2014**: 
if change "char s[1];"  to  "char s[];" error:

# ./all.bash
# Building C bootstrap tool.
cmd/dist

# Building compilers and Go bootstrap tool for host, darwin/amd64.
lib9
libbio
libmach
liblink
misc/pprof
cmd/addr2line
cmd/objdump
cmd/prof
cmd/cc
cmd/gc
/usr/local/go/src/cmd/gc/obj.c:210:10: error: field 'lit' with variable sized type
'Strlit' (aka 'struct Strlit') not at the end of a struct or class is a GNU extension
[-Werror,-Wgnu]
go tool dist: FAILED: clang -Wall -Wstrict-prototypes -Wextra -Wunused -Wuninitialized
-Wno-sign-compare -Wno-missing-braces -Wno-parentheses -Wno-unknown-pragmas -Wno-switch
-Wno-comment -Wno-missing-field-initializers -Werror -fno-common -ggdb -pipe -O2
-fno-caret-diagnostics -Qunused-arguments -fmessage-length=0 -mmacosx-version-min=10.6
-c -m64 -I /usr/local/go/include -I /usr/local/go/src/cmd/gc -o
/usr/local/go/pkg/obj/cmd/gc/obj.o /usr/local/go/src/cmd/gc/obj.c
